snippet: In this new feature we'll publish a Times photo weekly, but we won't include an identifying caption, headline, article link or other clues about its origins. With our collaborators, Visual Thinking Strategies, we invite students to discuss what they...
abstract: In this new feature we'll publish a Times photo weekly, but we won't include an identifying caption, headline, article link or other clues about its origins. With our collaborators, Visual Thinking Strategies, we invite students to discuss what they see, and why.

headline.main: New Feature: What's Going On in This Picture?
